title: Receptionist Scandic Kungens Kurva
description:
**Nu söker vi en Receptionist extra vid behov till Scandic Kungens Kurva.**



Våra gäster bokar ofta rum hos oss med kort varsel och det gör att vi ofta är i behov av extra hjälp i receptionen med kort varsel. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som gästerna möter först och har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Vi ser självklart till att du får en gedigen upplärning och rätt förutsättningar för att kunna göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Du är flexibel då våra behov ofta dyker upp med kort varsel.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en anställning för enstaka dagar på extra vid behov.


Tjänsten kan utvecklas till en fast procentuell tjänst framöver. Din närmsta chef kommer att vara vår hotellchef. Jobbet omfattar för och eftermiddagsskift, vardagar och helger. Startdatum så snart som möjligt.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Verksamhetskoordinator Mat vid Siljan
description:
Tjänsten är säsongsbaserad med olika fokus beroende på säsong och verksamhetsställe. I nära samarbete med vår Verksamhetschef för Mat Vid Siljan är du höst-/vintertid en del av teamet som ser till så att vi kan leverera exceptionella mat- och gästupplevelser på någon av våra 12 restauranger och barer på Tegera Arena under SHL-säsongen. Vår-/sommartid skiftar fokus över till mat & dryck på Leksand Sommarland/Leksand Resort vilket innefattar allt från inköp, utbildning av sommarpersonal och framtagandet av rutin- och checklistor till att vara en nyckelspelare i den dagliga driften av en omfattande destination med 150.000 gäster årligen.
  
  

Ni kommer vara två verksamhetskoordinatorer med olika fokusområden baserat på kompetens, tidigare erfarenhet och intressen. Tillsammans med Verksamhetschefen för Mat Vid Siljan utgör ni ledningen för verksamhetsområdet.
  
  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter höst-/vintersäsong kan vara:**  

Arbetsledare under matcher och evenemang
  
Personalplanering och schemaläggning utifrån bokningsläge, gästflöde och evenemang
  
Lageransvar och inköp av varor till restauranger, kiosker och barer
  
Planera och genomföra merförsäljningsstrategier
  
Svara på offertförfrågningar och sköta kundkontakt för catering och konferenser
  
Koordinera marknadsföringsinsatser i samarbete med marknadsavdelningen
  
Planera och koordinera cateringuppdrag samt arbetsleda och arbeta service på plats
  
Administrera hemsida och sociala medier
  
Säkerställa att barer och restauranger är fullt utrustade inför matcher och evenemang
  
Uppföljning av verksamheten samt arbete med ständiga förbättringar
  
Stötta Verksamhetschef med diverse uppgifter
  
  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter vår-/sommarsäsong kan vara:**  

Personalplanering och schemaläggning
  
Utbilda och arbetsleda sommarpersonalen inför och under säsongen
  
Ansvar över att restauranger och kiosker iordningställs inför säsongsstart
  
Säkerställa att samtliga restauranger och kiosker alltid är fullt utrustade och påfyllda för att möta efterfrågan
  
Lageransvar och inköp av varor till restauranger och kiosker
  
Ansvara för kundkontakt och genomförandet av cateringuppdrag samt konferenser
  
Uppföljning av verksamheten samt arbete med ständiga förbättringar
  
Stötta Verksamhetschef med diverse uppgifter
  
  

Om företaget
  
  

Mat Vid Siljan driver en omfattande restaurang- och cateringverksamhet, bland annat i Tegera Arena samt på Leksand Sommarland och Leksand Resort. Mat Vid Siljan är en del av Leksand Resort-koncernen som även driver följande verksamheter:
  
  

Leksand Sommarland, en vatten- och nöjespark med 46 attraktioner
  
Leksand Resort med cirka 237 stugor, över 400 campingtomter, 25 glampingtält och 28 uthyrbara husvagnar
  
Moskogen hotell & restaurang som har hotell-, restaurang- och konferensverksamhet
  
  

Tillsammans är vi runt 35 helårsanställda och under sommarsäsongen är vi över 400 personer som arbetar inom våra olika verksamheter. Vi erbjuder våra gäster kvalitativa upplevelser inom boende, aktiviteter, mat och dryck. Vi har boenden från tält till lyxiga stugor i natursköna miljöer, vi har utmanande aktiviteter och nervkittlande attraktioner och vi erbjuder allt från en snabb lunch till en mer exklusiv komponerad meny. Leksand Resort-koncernen ägs sedan mars 2022 av Sveriges ledande campingkoncern First Camp.
  
  

Din profil
  
  

För att lyckas som Verksamhetskoordinator hos oss trivs du med att arbeta i en miljö med högt tempo där utmaningar hanteras löpande och där du gärna kommer med utvecklings- och förbättringsförslag. Du är van vid att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där flexibilitet och servicekänsla är nyckeln till framgång. Du har minst 3 års erfarenhet av arbetsledning inom restaurangbranschen, exempelvis som Restaurangchef eller liknande befattning. Relevant utbildning och erfarenhet av arbete i Casepco Cloud samt erfarenhet av marknadsföring och evenemangskoordinering är meriterande. Du är strukturerad, serviceminded och trivs i en roll där du både självständigt och tillsammans med dina kollegor arbetar för att våra verksamheter ska fungera så bra som möjligt. Vi vill även att du som person har en prestigelös inställning till dina arbetsuppgifter då vi utöver våra ordinarie uppdrag hjälps åt där det behövs. B-körkort krävs.
  
  

Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
  
  

Vad kan vi erbjuda?
  
  

En viktig och varierad roll i spännande verksamheter under ständig utveckling. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid, provanställning tillämpas. Individuell lönesättning, övriga villkor enligt kollektivavtal med Unionen. Friskvårdsbidrag.
  
  

Är du vår nya stjärna? Sök jobbet direkt från mobilen genom att svara på ett antal frågor. Inget CV eller dokument behövs i ett första läge. Allt går snabbt och smidigt på bara några minuter.

title: Commercial Lead till itm8:s satsning inom Cybersecurity
description:
Tillsammans med 14 andra nordiska IT-företag har vi bildat itm8, ett nytt nordeuropeiskt powerhouse inom digital transformation. Vi söker nu dig som vill vara med på resan och som trivs i situationer där alla svar inte är givna, men du kommer att ta dig an att finna dem tillsammans med ambitiösa och drivna kollegor.
  
  

Ta ledningen för vår kommersiella satsning inom cybersäkerhet Som Commercial Lead Cybersecurity hos oss får du en unik möjlighet att bygga och driva vår kommersiella strategi, samtidigt som du vägleder våra kunder genom ett av de mest kritiska områdena i dagens digitala landskap. Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bidra till vår fortsatta tillväxt? Läs vidare för att se hur du kan göra skillnad!
  
  

Din roll i vårt teamI denna centrala roll ansvarar du för att leda vår go-to-market inom cybersäkerhet och säkerställa att våra tjänster, produkter och lösningar exponeras effektivt på marknaden. Du samarbetar med domänledare, tjänsteägare och säljchefer för att utbilda och inspirera våra säljteam samt agera säljstöd och driva viktiga säljprocesser. Tillsammans skapar vi en stark position och växande affär inom Cybersecurity.
  
Du kommer också att vara en viktig kraft i vår SecurityHub, där du samarbetar med viktiga interna stakeholders och bidrar till att vi ligger steget före i att utveckla och anpassa våra tjänster till marknadens förändringar. Utöver detta kommer du vara en av flera talespersoner inom cybersäkerhet, uppsöka och delta i speaking opportunities och sprida vårt säkerhetserbjudande genom sociala medier och andra plattformar.
  
  

**Vad du kommer att göra hos oss Leda vår go-to-market:** Driva vår kommersiella plan och säkerställa att vi når våra tillväxtmål.
  
**Utbilda och inspirera säljteamet:** Se till att våra säljare är rustade med den kunskap och inspiration de behöver för att framgångsrikt sälja våra cybersecurity-lösningar.
  
**Säljstöd och pipeline:** Stödja säljprocesser och driva egna med fokus på att uppnå våra intäktsmål.
  
**Omvärldsbevakning:** Håll koll på marknadstrender och bidra till att vårt erbjudande ligger i framkant.
  
**Talesperson:** Representera oss externt genom att vara aktiv i sociala medier och tala på evenemang.
  
**Bygga relationer:** Utveckla starka relationer med våra kunder och partners, och säkerställa att vi är deras förstahandsval inom cybersäkerhet.
  
  

**Vem är vår nya Commercial Lead?Vi söker dig som har:**  

Gedigen erfarenhet inom IT och cybersäkerhet, med en djup förståelse för IT- och security-utvecklingen över tid.
  
Omfattande bakgrund inom försäljning och marknadsföring, där du har haft en ledande roll och arbetat operativt och strategiskt för att driva försäljning och affärsutveckling.
  
Ledarskapserfarenhet, antingen direkt eller indirekt, där du har visat förmåga att leda utan att formellt vara chef.
  
Stark trovärdighet inom cybersäkerhetsbranschen, med upparbetade relationer hos kunder och leverantörer.
  
  

Du är en affärsmässig initiativtagare med förmågan att se vad som behöver göras och säkerställa att det blir gjort. Du trivs med att arbeta målinriktat, skapa tydliga riktlinjer och uppnå resultat tillsammans med andra. Dessutom är du trygg i din expertis och kan inspirera och leda andra.
  
  

Vad gör denna roll unik?Rollen som Commercial Lead Cybersecurity är ny och skapad för att stärka vår satsning inom cybersäkerhet. Du har friheten att forma och driva den kommersiella strategin och ta ansvar för vår intäktsbudget inom cybersecurity. Med stöd från både svenska och danska kollegor i vårt SecurityHub får du möjligheten att sätta riktningen för hur vi växer inom detta område, samtidigt som du syns både internt och externt som en talesperson för vårt varumärke inom cybersäkerhet.
  
  

**Redo att utmana(s) med itm8? Start:** Så snart som möjligt, med hänsyn till eventuell uppsägningstid.
  
**Plats:** Göteborg, Stockholm eller Malmö.
  
  

Varmt välkommen att ansöka! Om du har frågor innan du ansöker, skriv gärna till oss i meddelanderutan eller kontakta Andreas Ferm (Business Unit Manager Cloud Infrastructure & Cybersecurity) på andreas.ferm@itm8.se så följer vi upp med dig. Sista ansökningsdag är den 25 oktober och eftersom vihanterar ansökningar löpande, så rekommenderar vi dig attskicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Givetvis behandlar vi din ansökan konfidentiellt.
  
På itm8 tror vi att mångfald driver innovation och stärker oss som företag. Vi välkomnar därför ansökningar från alla kön, bakgrunder och erfarenheter. Om du vill vara med och forma framtidens cybersäkerhetslösningar, vill vi höra från dig!

title: Lead Architect, Smart Manufacturing COE
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*


Your role


We are seeking a Lead Architect for Smart Manufacturing to take an important role in Saab's digital transformation in the manufacturing domain. As the Lead Architect for the Smart Manufacturing Center of Excellence (COE), you will be responsible for driving the domain architectural vision, ensuring alignment with the company's strategic goals, and fostering innovation in digital manufacturing solutions. Collaborating with various business units, stakeholders, and IT teams, you will define and implement scalable, secure, and future-proof architectures that connect manufacturing operations with enterprise IT systems, contributing to the overall digital transformation.

  

Main responsibilities:

* Architectural Vision: Collaborate with key stakeholders to ensure a comprehensive and updated Smart Manufacturing domain architecture that supports organizational goals.
* Defining Architecture: Develop and maintain architectural standards for Operational Technology (OT) and IT components, ensuring alignment with Saab's digital transformation vision.
* Stakeholder Collaboration: Work with business unit stakeholders and IT teams to align Smart Manufacturing solutions with specific needs and cross-functional goals.
* Proof of Concept & Technology Evaluation: Lead PoC initiatives to validate new technologies and platforms, ensuring they meet performance, scalability, and security requirements.
* Service & Solution Development: Support the development of IT and OT services that bridge enterprise systems (ERP, PLM) with operational systems (MES, SCADA, IoT).
* Demand Discovery: Conduct workshops and capability mapping to uncover business needs and identify areas for innovation.
* Technology Selection: Guide teams in selecting technologies (MES, IoT, SCADA) that enhance business value and ensure seamless integration.
* Technical Leadership: Provide senior technical guidance to development teams, ensuring adherence to architecture standards.
* Best Practices & Compliance: Establish best practices for manufacturing-related IT/OT systems and ensure compliance with architectural principles and performance standards.


The workplace is located in one of our locations: Järfälla, Alvik, Linköping or Göteborg


Your Profile


 We are looking for a proactive and innovative individual eager to drive change within our organisation. This role requires strong communication skills, the ability to ask the right questions, and a keen ear for understanding others. Key qualities include effective collaboration, relationship-building skills, and the capacity to motivate and engage others.

  

In addition, we value a candidate who are energetic, driven, and motivated to explore multiple approaches while maintaining a broad perspective. Curiosity is key; candidates should be willing to embrace challenges and pave the way for new solutions. Furthermore, it is essential to see the bigger picture within a complex organisation while also understanding the necessary details when required.


For the role of Lead Architect COE Smart Manufacturing, we believe that you have the following skills and experience:

* 5+ years of experience in a lead role as an IT Solutions Architect within Smart Manufacturing or Industry 4.0 environments.
* Extensive technical expertise in IT infrastructure and platforms, including cloud, hybrid, and on-premise solutions, with a focus on Smart Manufacturing ecosystems.
* Experience in the modeling, design, and documentation of advanced IT solutions, with a strong emphasis on digital transformation and Smart Manufacturing systems.
* In-depth knowledge of architectural layers ranging from enterprise to solution and system architecture, aligned with Industry 4.0 standards.
* Master’s degree in Systems Engineering, Computer Science, Automation, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams, drive technology evaluations, and lead Proof of Concept (PoC) initiatives.
* Strong leadership, problem-solving, and communication skills, with a track record of collaborating with various stakeholders.
* Knowledge of security, compliance, and architectural best practices.
* Fluent in both Swedish and English.


This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.


What you will be part of


Behind our innovations stand the people who make them possible. Brave pioneers and curious minds. Everyday heroes and inventive troubleshooters. Those who share deep knowledge and those who explore sky-high. And everyone in between.


Joining us means making an impact together, contributing in our own unique ways. From crafting complex code and building impressive defence and security solutions to simply sharing a coffee with a colleague, every action counts. We encourage you to take on challenges, to create smart inventions and grow in our friendly and tech-savvy workspace. We have a solid mission to keep people and society safe.


Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 23,000 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.


Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Business Intelligence and Analytics Lead / Transformation Lead
description:
**Om tjänsten**
---------------

  

Are you the analytical, proactive lead with the drive to help Vattenfall enable a fossil fuel free life within a generation? Here is a unique opportunity for you.  

  

Vattenfall is now looking for the right person to fill the position as **Business Intelligence and Analytics Lead** in a new unit called Finance Analytics Systems Team (FAST). FAST is a sub unit of Financial Systems, that is responsible for approx. 50 different groupwide applications such as the ERP systems, Data Warehouses, Consolidation systems, Planning systems, as several different BI/Analytics systems and more.  

  

The FAST unit in Finance Business Support represents a hybrid setup between Finance and IT. The role of transformation lead is to be seen as a bridge that understand the business demand, the Finance and ERP processes and steer IT in the development teams. You will act as an enabler to design innovative solutions in the analytics and planning area and to manage the build of the solution as part of the product portfolio we are deploying via the Analytics Steering Board (ASB).  

  

We are looking for a strong personality with a lot of hands-on experience. You will to a large extent support the FAST department within FBS to shape and execute the roadmap and the strategy in the Corporate Analytics and Planning area.  

  

You will share the responsibly with the FAST team for building and steering end to end solutions, therefore experience working cross-functional among the stakeholders in the different VF Business Areas, the IT Supply organization and Group IT is highly needed.  

  

Buzzwords like harmonization, standardization and digitalization will be your everyday challenges for which you need to proof a strong ability to think strategically across.  

  

**Responsibilities will include:**

* Responsible for steering the build of a new product from the requirement phase until the release phase in the Analytics and Planning portfolio
* Fulfill the role of product owner to develop scope and define backlog items (epic/features/user stories) that guide the Agile development team.
* Work closely with Information Technology professionals in Vattenfall to analyze current technologies used within the company and determine ways to improve
* Be account for possible project challenges on constraints including, risks, time, resources and scope
* Responsible for defining clear goals for all aspects of a project and manage their proper execution by providing detailed specifications for proposed solutions
* Responsible for assessing and following up the business case of the transformation projects
* Responsible for bridging between business and IT for securing the continuity of the project
* Responsible for supporting the governance bodies in the Analytics area (Analytics Steering Board, Product Owner Board and the LKUG)
* Responsible to support managing the application portfolio in the Corporate Analytics and Planning areas
* Responsible to contribute in developing strategies within FAST for effective advanced data analytics and reporting base on new technologies opportunities and new trends, such S/4 Hana Analytics, Azure Services, Planning, etc.
* Be part of the journey of digitalization, harmonization, standardization, process improvement and automation of the Financial and business processes of Vattenfall

**Din bakgrund**
----------------

 **To be successful, we believe that you have the following experience:**

* Equivalent relevant university degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or closely related Engineering field.
* Experience in software engineering and design architecture
* Advanced understanding of business analysis techniques and processes
* Deep understanding and experience with Agile methodologies
* Creative and Strategic thinking
* Proven ability to manage different stakeholders and their expectations.
* Proven working relationship, collaborative, and communication skills
* Proven ability to convince and create value propositions
* Proven experience in different technologies used in the product portfolio (such as Microsoft SQL technology, Azure Cloud infrastructure and SAP BW)
* Knowledge skills in the areas of SAP ERP, IBM, QlikView, SAP planning products and interest in S/4 are bonus points for this position

**Mer information**
-------------------

  

At Vattenfall, we believe, that the only way to make fossil free living within a generation possible is to power and help manage all energy-aspects of our customers’ lives to create climate smarter living - building by building, district by district, city by city.  

  

**Our Offer**  

We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues as ‘Ask and Share’ concept is essential for the way we work. We offer attractive employment conditions (smart working, flexible working hours and a good-work-life balance) and opportunities for personal and professional development. Click here for further information*.*  

  

**Location**  

Solna  

  

**For more information** about the position you are welcome to contact hiring manager Latifa si Youcef on latifa.siyoucef@vattenfall.com For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Carolina Osterman on carolina.osterman@vattenfall.com  

  

**Trade union representatives** in Sweden Rolf Ohlsson (Akademikerna), Anders Bohlin (Unionen), Christer Gustafsson (Ledarna), Juha Siipilehto (SEKO). To get in contact with the representatives, please call Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.  

  

**We welcome your application in English no later than 20th of October 2024**. We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website.  

  

At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Click here for further information.  

  

The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall. The screening will be performed by a third party, Validata.  

  

We look forward to receiving your application!

**Om oss**
----------

  

Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 20,000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We now want to make fossil free living possible within one generation and we are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.

title: Software Product Owner for ToolsControl
description:
**Software Product Owner for ToolsControl**
===========================================

Functional area: Research and Development
Country: Sweden
City: Stockholm
Company name: Atlas Copco Industrial Technique AB
Date of posting: Oct 4, 2024  

At Atlas Copco, we focus on driving change and delivering customer value in a sustainable way. As the Product Owner for our software product ToolsControl, you’ll play a pivotal role in creating cutting-edge solutions that transform industrial operations and contribute to a more sustainable future. This is a chance to lead product innovation while making a lasting impact on the manufacturing industry and the environment. ToolsControl is a software product controlling advanced assembly tools in manufacturing facilities around the world and achieving streamlined efficiency with a single point of connection.

  


**Your role**


As a Product Owner, you will be at the heart of our product development process, working closely with business stakeholders, the Product Manager, Architect, and the development team to ensure our products’ success. Your role involves building strong relationships with stakeholders and effectively communicating complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences. Over time, you will develop deep technical knowledge of your product’s technology area, becoming a champion of its use and understanding the customers’ needs and deployment environments. Leading software development projects using Scrum/SAFe methodologies, you will guide your team towards delivering high-quality solutions.

  


In this role, you will work with containerized and orchestration software, both on-premises and in the cloud, to develop and deploy innovative solutions. You will also address complex challenges and drive innovation by leveraging your understanding of network communication and Linux operating systems in virtual environments. Additionally, you will participate in our department’s efforts to adopt a more unified way of working based on SAFe practices.

  


**City:** Sickla, Sweden. We offer a hybrid work setup, with most of our time spent at the office.

  


You report to Robert Stribeck, Team Manager Application Software R&D.

  


**You will need**


* Experience in leading software development with Scrum/SAFe methodology
* Knowledge of low level network communication, Linux and/or virtual environments
* Knowledge of cyber security technology and processes
* Good communication skills in English
* Experience with stakeholder management and relationship building

  




**We offer**


* A friendly and professional environment with a proven history of innovation
* Plenty of opportunities to grow and develop
* A culture known for respectful interaction, ethical behavior, and integrity
* The potential to see your ideas realized and to make an impact
* Access to global job opportunities as part of the Atlas Copco Group

  




If you’re ready to make a significant impact and grow with us, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and join our innovative journey!

  


**Diverse by nature and inclusive by choice**  

Bright ideas come from all of us. The more unique perspectives we embrace, the more innovative we are. Together we build a culture where difference is valued and we share a deep sense of purpose and belonging.
company_description: Atlas Copco provides compressed air & vacuum equipment, industrial power tools, construction equipment, and rental options.

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Senior Infrastructure Engineer


Swedium Global is looking for Senior Infrastructure Engineer for one of its customer


Location: Stockholm or UK  

Start Date: 2024-10-15  

End Date: 2025-04-30


We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer that will join the team in our Platform mission that enables engineers to effectively utilize cloud infrastructure by providing a platform for infrastructure composition. Our declarative infrastructure is built on top of Kubernetes and we work closely with Google to make sure our platform scales with the growing number of managed resources.  

  

Engineers with a solid engineering background (MSc. in engineering of related)  

\*Engineers with experience extending k8s, writing their own or maintaining k8s operators and CRDs  

\*Experience within platform organisations is a plus  

\*Experience with GCP is a plus  

  

Who you are:  

A valued team player in an autonomous, cross-functional team that inspires others experienced in designing, analyzing, optimizing code, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems.  

Experienced with Kubernetes, GKE, and Google Cloud Platform.  

Knowledgeable in how to write distributed, high-performance services and experienced in deploying and operating services on Linux.  

Passionate about infrastructure as code  

Can use scripting languages where needed to glue pieces together  

Have experience with Java and/or Go  

Equipped with a systematic problem-solving approach coupled with effective communication skills and drive.  

Excited about working on a team where you constantly learn, experiment, and iterate quickly.  

  

What you'll do:  

As a team, we build a platform that enables infrastructure as code at Customer, with the entire engineering organization as our users.  

The tech stack you’ll work on includes Kubernetes operators (typically in Golang); supporting backend services (in Java); utilities and scripts (in Python and Bash); analytics data pipelines (in Python and SQL); and a lot of declaratively managed infrastructure of our own (in YAML).  

Collaborate closely with our sister platform squads and become a valued member of an autonomous, cross-functional team.  

We want you to bring your whole self to work and strive to foster an environment that supports your individual growth.


  
Job Overview


* Location : Stockholm or UK, Sweden
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : Infrastructure as code, Golang, Java, Kubernetes, GKE

title: Senior Projektledare inom tjänstetransitioner
description:
*Är du redo att leda spännande IT-tjänstetransitioner och bidra till Advanias framgång? Vi söker en erfaren och Senior Projektledare till vårt nationella projektledarteam!*

**Senior transitionsprojektledare på Advania**
----------------------------------------------

Inom Advanias affärsområde Managed Services Provider hjälper vi våra kunder att digitalisera sina verksamheter och optimera sina processer med hjälp av IT-tjänster och teknik. Vi är tjänstefokuserade och arbetar med allt från implementation av public och private cloud-lösningar till skräddarsydda nätverk- arbetsplats- och supporttjänster som ökar effektiviteten och konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder. Vi tar hand om kundernas IT, så de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.


I rollen som Senior Projektledare för transitionsprojekt ansvarar du för att leda och genomföra de allra mest komplexa transitionsprojekten från start till mål. Detta inkluderar hela projektlivscykeln från anbud och förhandling till leverans och överlämning till förvaltningsteam.

**Det innebär bland annat:**

* Medverkan i Advanias anbudsarbete i privata och offentliga upphandlingar av IT-tjänsteavtal
* Framtagande och presentation av projektanbud för tjänstetransitioner
* Genomförande av due diligence.
* Leverans av transitionsprojekt i tid, på budget och med nöjd kund!
* Kvalitativa tjänsteetableringar vilka borgar för stabil och effektiv driftleverans över tid.
* Kontinuerlig utveckling av Advanias transitionsprocesser tillsammans med seniora kollegor


Detta är en strategiskt mycket viktig roll i vårt affärsområde för managerade tjänster, och du blir en del av ett erfaret team av projektledare som ansvarar för samtliga projekt inom affärsområdet.

**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------

För att du ska trivas och passa hos oss söker vi dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT tjänsteleverans och en bred teknisk förståelse, med stor erfarenhet av införande av IT-tjänster till privat och offentlig verksamhet. Vi tror att du motiveras av att med ett ben kvar i leveransen leda framgångsrika projekt, lösa komplexa problem och samarbeta nära både kunder, interna team och ledning. Du uppskattar att ha stort mandat och att verka i en prestigefri arbetsmiljö där innovation och samarbete står i centrum, och där du aldrig är långt ifrån den dagliga leveransen.

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Erfarenhet av att leda stora transitioner av IT-tjänster
* Minst 15 års erfarenhet i IT-Branschen
* Mycket god förståelse för IT-drift och tjänster inom infrastruktur, arbetsplats och support
* God kommunikationsförmåga, flytande svenska och engelska
* Mycket starka ledaregenskaper

**Meriterande:**

* Dokumenterad projektledarutbildning, gärna med certifiering inom exempelvis PRINCE2, PPS eller PMI PMP.

### **Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.


Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.


Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
company_description: Advania är ett techbolag som utformar skräddarsydda lösningar och skapar hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik.

title: Head of Data Science to Moank
description:
Join the innovative team at Moank, a fast-growing fintech company, as their Head of Data Science. You'll lead their data-driven strategy, shaping the future of the business with cutting-edge AI technologies. If you're passionate about AI and eager to drive impactful change, this could be the opportunity for you!

### **Job description**


Moank is an innovative financial technology company dedicated to enhancing user experiences through cutting-edge technologies. They are currently in the beginning of a bold and ambitious scale-up phase where you, as their Head of Data Science, will contribute with your expertise, building AI-powered products that make a real impact. Their team is small but highly motivated, giving you the opportunity to develop and implement new ideas and projects.


You will collaborate closely with colleagues across different functions at Moank, with the goal to design, implement, and deploy AI models that enhance Moank’s products and services.

### **You will for example;**

* Lead the Data Science team.
* Design, develop, and optimise Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for various AI-driven products.
* Work with embeddings and other NLP techniques to improve search and retrieval functionalities.
* Collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and product managers to integrate AI models into existing systems.
* Experiment with and implement state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to improve model performance.
* Analyse large datasets to extract meaningful patterns and insights.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and NLP, and apply these to our projects.
* Ensure the scalability, efficiency, and reliability of AI solutions within the company’s tech stack.

### **What Moank Offer:**

* A dynamic and collaborative work environment with opportunities to work on cutting-edge AI projects.
* The chance to shape the future of AI-driven products within a growing company.
* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Flexible working hours and remote work options.

### **Who you are**

To thrive in this position you are excellent at problem-solving and continuously curious about new ways of working and doing things. You build trust through your expertise and have the ability to listen in on your team-members before you take action. You can understand different aspects of a complex problem and have a positive mind-set with a strong willingness to get things done. We also believe that you have strong communication skills and the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

### **Other requirements for this role is;**

* Experience in building RAG systems and working with embeddings.
* Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, and experience with relevant frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face).
* Deep understanding of natural language processing techniques, including transformers, word embeddings, and sequence-to-sequence models.
* Experience with large-scale data processing and working with databases.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is preferred.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science.

### **About the Company**

*Find out more about Moank and what it’s like to work with them at* *www.moank.se**‍*

### **Practical info**


Place of employment: Mäster Samuelsgatan in central Stockholm


Start date: ASAP, with regard to notice period


In this process Moank is working together with Winona, if you have any questions please contact Recruitment Responsible: Linda Lundgren at linda.lundgren@winonagroup.com


Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the screening or interview phase.

title: Data Centre Engineering Operations Chief Engineer, ARN- DCEO
description:
* Bachelor’s or Master degree in Electrical / Mechanical Engineering or equivalent depending on where you received your qualification.
* 5+ years relevant industry related experience. · Demonstrate key electrical and mechanical competencies and theory.
* Know and apply safe electrical practice according to guidelines set by relevant electrical safety supervisory bodies.
* In-depth knowledge and experience of Data Center infrastructure: UPS, backup generator systems and generic mechanical-room infrastructure chillers, Cooler Units, and fan controls).
* Fundamental knowledge of network design and layout (copper / fibre) as well as low / high voltage (copper/ fibre) cabling, BMS Systems, Monitoring and alarming systems · Full EU driving license.


Amazon is looking for a Chief Engineer to join our Data Center Engineering Operations Team in Sweden. Data center Engineering Operation teams maintain the critical physical infrastructure that supports Amazon Web Services. Specifically, this team works to ensure that the data center's MEP operates at 100% availability while maintaining first-class customer service to the teams and groups within the data centers.
  
  

The Data Center Chief Engineer (CE) is responsible for ensuring that all electrical, mechanical, and fire/life safety equipment within the data center is operating at peak efficiency. This involves both planned preventative maintenance of equipment, daily corrective work, and emergency response to emergent issues. The CE serves as an expert technical resource interacting with onsite Engineering Operations Technicians (EOT) and any third-party vendors. They are expected to be a singular focal point for all facility operations and to support Amazon within its owned and operated data centers.
  
Also expected from the CE is the ability to manage large scale impacting technical projects and new region support from conception to completion. These projects involve large amounts of independent work as well as collaboration with external support groups including engineering, automation, procurement, and finance in both local and global settings. The CE will be tasked with creating and delivering on key milestones, obtaining and tracking quotes for all necessary costs, and documenting project results for future implementation at other facilities. The goals of such projects are for the CE to drive innovation and resiliency while reducing operational costs in the facilities.
  
The CE directs, trains and supports EOTs in their role of providing hands-on electrical and mechanical equipment troubleshooting and operations. Implementation and execution of site/equipment-specific training exercises is also expected. This equipment includes, but is not limited to, stand-by diesel generators, switchgear, UPSs, PDUs, AHUs, chillers, cooling towers, chemical treatment systems, pumps, motors, VFDs, and building automation systems.
  
The role will be based in Sweden (Eskilstuna, Vasteras and Katrineholm), however flexibility is required to travel to other locations within the EMEA region if required.
  
  

Physical Requirements,
  
* Work at heights and from ladders.
* Perform physical tasks during the shift
* Work in a noisy environment with ear protection.


AWS Infrastructure Services owns the design, planning, delivery, and operation of all AWS global infrastructure. In other words, we’re the people who keep the cloud running. We support all AWS data centers and all of the servers, storage, networking, power, and cooling equipment that ensure our customers have continual access to the innovation they rely on. We work on the most challenging problems, with thousands of variables impacting the supply chain — and we’re looking for talented people who want to help.
  
  

You’ll join a diverse team of software, hardware, and network engineers, supply chain specialists, security experts, operations managers, and other vital roles. You’ll collaborate with people across AWS to help us deliver the highest standards for safety and security while providing seemingly infinite capacity at the lowest possible cost for our customers. And you’ll experience an inclusive culture that welcomes bold ideas and empowers you to own them to completion.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
  

. Act as a technical referent for Engineering Operation Technicians
  
* Oversee the day-to-day operations and maintenance of mechanical and electrical equipment in data centers
* Operate independently with limited direct management
* Assist in the design and build out of new facilities
* Act as an escalation point for all facilities-related technical issues within the data center region and work OT hours as needed to support site stability
* Perform root cause analysis of equipment failures
* Troubleshoot and report of facility and data sever-level events within internal SLA
* Create and deploy new standard practices for Engineering Operations Technicians, Chief Engineers, and vendor support teams
* Provide training and guidance to Engineering Operations Technicians and assisting in recruiting efforts for the same
* Ensure all safety procedures are adhered to by vendor and Amazon staff
* Utilize internal Change Management Systems to manage building workflows
* MV/LV Isolation to facilitate MV maintenance
* Provide metric availability reporting on a weekly basis
* Communicate complex technical information to a non-technical audience


**Competencies:**  

The successful candidate must be able to demonstrate the following competencies and behaviors:
  
* Solve problems at their root, stepping back to understand the broader context.
* Aptitude for troubleshooting and problem solving.
* Maintain SLAs through the implementation of proactive issue detection and immediate response.
* Proven experience of reading SLDs and control schematics.
* Follow support procedures, system documentation, and issue tracking entries into a trouble ticket system.
* Shows good judgment and instincts in decision making.
* Prioritize in complex, fast-paced environment.
* Demonstrate their ability to take ownership of technical issues brought to them by their customer base.


**The successful candidate will be accountable for:**  

* Setting and maintaining the highest standards for safety and actively promoting a world-class safety culture in all aspects of operational procedure
* Driving continuous improvement efforts on infrastructure through standardization of procedures and policies, while delivering performance against agreed metrics
* Enabling the operations organization to delivering 100% up-time on all customer supporting infrastructure
* Collaborating effectively with internal & external stakeholders to deliver operational excellence for all AWS customers
* Responsible for ensuring that the preventive maintenance of site-critical facility infrastructure is planned and executed to the highest standards, in accordance to AWS procedures
* In charge of facility monitoring & supervision (via BMS, PMS, Walkthrough...etc.)
* Participation in the successful delivery of build-out and retrofit of Data Center infrastructure
* Ensuring organizational capability to react & respond appropriately to any potential customer-impacting event on any component of electrical or mechanical infrastructure.
* Reviewing incident reports, documenting periodic trend summaries, and providing updates and recommended actions to management
* Draft, update & maintain method statements, standard operating procedures, emergency response procedures, preventive maintenance programs, and all technical documentation pertaining to DCEO


A day in the life
  
A day in the life
  
Working semi-autonomously in operation and maintenance of mechanical and electrical equipment in a data center
  
Execution of project scopes of basic complexity
  
Providing timely escalation for all facilities-related issues within the data center
  
First-line troubleshooting and reporting of facility and high-criticality events within a pre-determined service level agreement (SLA)
  
Providing assistance to junior and peer EOTs
  
Oversight of third-party vendors to ensure that all work performed is in accordance with established safety protocols, best practices, and local legislation
  
Utilization of administrative tools for change management, ticketing, and asset management.
  
Flexibility for changes to work schedule depending on specific site needs. Shifts can be up to 12-hours and may rotate on a predefined schedule.
  
  

About the team
  
Diverse Experiences
  
AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
  
Why AWS?
  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
  
  

Inclusive Team Culture
  
Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
  
  

Mentorship & Career Growth
  
We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
  
  

Work/Life Balance
  
We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
  
  

* 6+ years of experience in operations and on-call support for Data Center facilities or Mission Critical Plants/Production facilities.
* Project Management experience.


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.

title: Subject Matter expert – SAP P2P Ariba Consultant
description:
**Job ID:** 260472


**Date posted:** 04/10/2024


**Who you are**  

  

We believe that you are passionate about fulfilling new needs and delivering outcome to our business stakeholders as well as technology service operations. You appreciate the mix of strategic thinking and turning architecture trends and requirements into practice. You get motivated to keep learning and to forget the obsolete and to work agile and being open to the change. In addition, you are energized by working both independently and interdependently and cross functions. Last but not the least you share and live the IKEA culture and values.
  

  

As the SAP Ariba SME, your mission is to oversee and optimize the SAP Ariba platform, including Ariba Buying & Invoicing, Ariba Sourcing, SAP Business Network Commerce Automation, EDI, and cross-modular integrations. You will play a crucial role in streamlining procurement processes, driving efficiency, and enhancing collaboration within the organization and with external partners. Additionally, you will be responsible for providing expert-level advice and solutions related to VIM module. You will work closely with our clients to understand their business processes, gather requirements, design, configure, test, and deploy SAP VIM solutions. You will also provide technical expertise, guidance, and support to the project team and end users.  

  

  

  

You have knowledge in and will be working in the below areas:
  

  

* Work with SAP Ariba teams and provide guidance and support to ensure the successful implementation and operation of Ariba solutions for the global project.
* Collaborate with stakeholders and business units from various locations to understand their procurement needs and translate them into effective Ariba solutions that align with global standards.
* Manage the configuration and customization of Ariba modules to meet the diverse requirements of multiple locations while ensuring consistency and standardization.
* Manage the configuration and customization of Ariba modules to meet the diverse requirements of multiple locations while ensuring consistency and standardization.
* Oversee the integration of Ariba with other SAP modules and external systems through CPI, CIG, EDI and other integration methods to enable seamless data exchange on a global scale.
* Monitor and report on the performance of Ariba processes and KPIs across locations, identifying areas for improvement and optimization to achieve a successful big bang go-live.
* Support the testing and validation of Ariba functionalities and integrations, working closely with teams to ensure a robust and reliable system for a large user base.
* Stay updated with the latest developments in SAP Ariba and related technologies, recommending upgrades and enhancements suitable for the global project's requirements.
* Resolve complex issues related to Ariba configurations, integrations, and processes in a timely manner, providing global support and ensuring minimal disruption during the go-live.
* SAP-Ariba Generic, SAP-Ariba with Downstream & Upstream, SAP-Ariba Contract Management, SAP-Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance, SAP-Ariba CIG, SAP-Ariba Strategic Sourcing, SAP-Ariba MM.
* Hands-on experience in configuring SAP VIM configurations, workflows, document types, and post-processing framework (PPF).
* Have worked in all modules of OpenText: IES/BCC, VIM, Archive server, BC.
* Strong experience in implementing and supporting SAP VIM module, including configuration, testing, documentations and deployment.
* Excellent understanding of end-to-end Procure-to-Pay (P2P) business processes, invoice management, and accounts payable (AP) operations.
* Solid understanding of SAP VIM integration with other SAP modules such as FI, MM, and SD.

- Experience in SAP VIM and OpenText VIM - end to end configuration worked in following area: Open Text Archive server, VIM SAP AP – end to end process, Experience working with SAP PI/PO resources in integrating SAP with 3rd Party systems.
  

* Minimum of 12+ years of experience in SAP P2P applications design, implementation, and optimization, with a focus on SAP environments and cloud technologies.
* In-depth knowledge of SAP infrastructure components, including SAP ARIBA, VIM, ECC, SAP S/4HANA.
* Hands-on experience with P2P processes, configurations, integrations, design, AMS and controls.
* Familiarity with SAP P2P tools and services for monitoring, logging, and automation.
* Proven experience in configuring and managing clients, including designing, development management, and applications upgrades.
* Strong understanding of SAP architecture, landscape design along with all related SAP modules.
* Understanding of cloud security principles, best practices, and compliance requirements.
* Expertise in implementing automations tools and orchestration tools commonly available in market.
* Ability to develop automation scripts and workflows to streamline provisioning, configuration management, and maintenance tasks.
* Understand requirements which impact system design and works with business and project teams and other stake holders to develop solutions which address these requirements
* Strong project management skills, with the ability to lead cross-functional teams, manage project scope, and timeline, and drive successful project outcomes.
* Ability to review design documents, critique architecture recommendations from other SMEs
* Detail oriented and demonstrated ability to achieve goals and objectives with minimal direction
* Clear, concise business communication and experience conducting business requirements workshops with business users.

  

**Your responsibilities**  

  

Accountable for the Procurement processes delivery within our digital organisation. Responsible for the management of operations on the SAP ARIBA and VIM technologies to support the SAP systems hosted in a Cloud environment. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in procurement design, implementation, and support. This role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the optimal performance, availability, and security of our SAP landscape.
  

  

You will :
  

  

* This is a subject matter expert (SME) role as a SAP P2P Consultant which would be a part of the Ingka global SAP Centre of excellence (CoE).
* Lead, Design, implement, and support robust/scalable infrastructure solutions for SAP applications, including SAP Ariba, VIM, ECC, SAP S/4HANA.
* Oversee the implementation and deployment of SAP solutions, ensuring adherence to design specifications, project timelines, and quality standards.
* Collaborate with other SAP modules, teams and business stakeholders to define processes and system design as per requirements and ensure alignment with business objectives.
* Conduct assessments and performance tuning activities to identify and address bottlenecks, optimize resource utilization, and improve system reliability.
* Identify and address performance bottlenecks, system constraints, and areas for improvement through proactive monitoring, analysis, and tuning.
* Develop and implement automation scripts, tools, and workflows to streamline infrastructure provisioning, configuration management, and maintenance tasks.
* Define and enforce security policies, standards, and controls to safeguard SAP system design.
* Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, industry standards, and internal security guidelines.
* Develop and maintain documentation, workbooks and runbooks related to SAP Ariba, VIM, MM.
* Provide guidance and recommendations to stakeholders on best practices for configuration and security controls.
* Establish performance monitoring and alerting mechanisms for SAP systems.
* Analyze performance metrics, identify optimization opportunities, and implement tuning measures to improve system efficiency and resource utilization.
* Implement cost allocation tags and resource optimization strategies to minimize cloud spending without sacrificing performance or reliability.
* Promote adherence to cloud architecture principles, security controls, and operational procedures across project teams and stakeholders.
* Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends, particularly related to SAP infrastructure, and make recommendations for continuous improvement and innovation.

  

**Together as a team**  

  

We set the digital agenda to keep IKEA leading in an uncertain and fast-moving environment. We drive the development, provision and operation of our digital products and services through the use of new and existing technology and agile delivery methods to deliver at pace. At the same time, we provide a home for digital skills to both develop and extend the technical, people and business skills needed to ensure continuous development and growth of our digital capability.  

  

**Questions and support? Let's connect!**  

  

If you have any questions about the position or the recruitment process please contact the Recruiter, Rosie Geraghty- rosie.geraghty@ingka.com
  

  

We look forward to receiving your application and will be interviewing continuously for this position.
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: DevOps Cloud Engineer – Platform (Manufacturing Industry)
description:
Our client, a leading global IT service provider,is recruiting for a
 **DevOps Cloud Engineer – Platform** 
 to join their business in
 **Sweden.** 




  





  





**Position Title:** 




**DevOps Cloud Engineer – Platform (Manufacturing Industry)** 




  





**Position Type:** 




 Hybrid Remote. 3 Days Work form Office, 2 Days Remote.
 



  





**Start Date:** 




 ASAP
 



  





**Location:** 




 Stockholm Sweden
 



  





**Contact:** 




 Ramya | +49 (0) 89 23 88 98 456
 



  





  





**Job Description:** 




  





 We know that many different names are given to this role in other companies, and that the candidate experience likely spans a variety of areas including software development, cloud and traditional infrastructure. It is likely that in the past the candidate has had titles like DevOps, infrastructure, software, cloud or site reliability -engineer/architect.
 



  




* Bring best practices from DevOps and site reliability engineering disciplines to industrial technology while building and improving the tooling needed to support this.
* Design, test and deploy infrastructure to operate a modern factory producing large amounts of data and connected batteries daily using infrastructure as code.
* Collaborate with software engineers to develop automation solutions for how we safely test and deploy code on anything from battery packs to cloud to factory equipment.
* Work to develop and help to document client’s processes around infrastructure and software deployment, best practices and ways of working.
* Work with the Security team to continuously test, monitor, and improve the security of our infrastructure.
* Work with our IT department to help build out the right network architecture and deployment solutions for 3rd party software we need.
* Improve and build the ML/AI Platform leveraging the data available from all our factories
* Collaborate with a cross-functional group of experts across the company to make sure we build the right things together for the right reasons and learn how electrical batteries are designed, developed, and manufactured from cradle to grave
* Keep up with the state of the art in infrastructure, “everything as a software,” virtualization, CI/CD frameworks, cross-platform software development, engineering processes, as well as develop more domain knowledge in related areas (among others, automation, battery manufacturing and connectivity)
* Help us build a great team and make clients a great place to work!



  





  





**Skills & Requirements:** 




  




* Deploying and managing infrastructure in the cloud (AWS, GCP or Azure) using infrastructure as code (ideally Terraform)
* Experience working with Manufacturing Industry
* Developing and managing highly automated continuous integration and deployment pipelines and helping developers increase their productivity
* Working with distributed systems, microservices, load balancing, etc.
* Working with virtualization, containerization, Kubernetes and related technologies
* Programming skills in at least one language (ideally Go or Python) and desire to learn more.
* Good communication skills, ability to Get Stuff Done, and a learning mindset
* Passion for solving problems with technology in simple yet innovative ways especially with open-source software
* Qualities that we cherish are flexibility, sense of quality, friendliness, motivation to take on new challenges, grit and a sense of humor.

title: IT Solutions Engineer
description:
**Paf is a pioneering Nordic gaming company, founded on the Åland Islands in 1966 with a unique mission: to generate funds for the greater good of society. As one of the first gaming companies to launch online in 1999, we continue to lead the industry with innovative, exclusive games developed by our in-house Games Studio. Committed to shaping a safer gaming environment, we are proud to be an award-winning leader in responsible gaming, setting new standards that put players first.** 




  

 At Paf, our employees are our greatest asset. Our highly skilled internal IT team plays a crucial role in ensuring that everyone has the technology and support they need to excel. We are looking for an experienced IT Solutions Engineer to join this talented team and contribute to the design and implementation of top-notch IT solutions. 
   





 If you're excited about working in a dynamic environment and continuously improving internal systems, we'd love to see how you can contribute to our team.
 



  





**THE ROLE & TEAM**
 The Internal IT team at Paf is responsible for managing our infrastructure and supporting over 315 employees across multiple countries. We provide everything from essential IT equipment to advanced collaboration tools that drive our organization’s success.
 



 Currently, the team consists of four seasoned professionals who thrive in a collaborative, open, and dynamic work environment.
 



 As the IT Solutions Engineer, you will take an active role in enhancing and optimizing our internal systems and services. Your responsibilities will range from addressing day-to-day technical issues and setting up new systems to automating processes and improving existing solutions organization-wide.
 



**Key tasks include:**



* Handling software updates and process optimizations.
* Implementing new IT systems and automation.
* Troubleshooting and resolving IT issues, both large and small.
* Evaluating and improving current systems and processes.



**YOUR PROFILE**
 We are looking for someone passionate about creating efficient, high-quality IT solutions and who thrives in a hands-on, problem-solving role.
 



 We therefore believe you have a few years of experience in a similar role, with a background in managing and improving IT systems and services like those listed below. You are confident in your ability to implement meaningful improvements and have a strong drive to stay curious and proactive in identifying growth opportunities.
 



 Beyond your technical expertise, you're a true team player. You value open communication and knowledge-sharing, working collaboratively to enhance the team’s success.
 



**You need:**



* Extensive experience with computers and operating systems.
* Proficient in device management systems, particularly
 **Microsoft Intune** 
 .
* Network experience
* Working experience with Microsoft
 **Azure** 
 .



  

**Additional skill sets that will make you stand out:**



* Servers (eg. SQL)
* Google Cloud Platform and AWS
* Jira and Confluence or similar systems
* Powershell or similar scripting
* Jamf Device Management



**OUR OFFER** 



* Competitive salary.
* Occupational healthcare and insurance
* A hybrid work setup, based in
 **Stockholm** 
 (Sweden) or 
 **Mariehamn** 
  (Åland Islands)
* A culture of care, creativity and collaboration
* A workplace that encourages individuals and personal growth



  





**Information:**
**Start:** 
 Immediately, subject to your notice period.
   

**Scope:** 
 Full-time, with flexible working hours.
   

**Location:** 
  Stockholm or Mariehamn (Åland islands). 
   

**Application** 
 : Please send your application via application form, due to GDPR compliance reasons we cannot accept applications per email.
 



 We work continuously with the selection and the ad can be closed down before the position is filled if we have decided to continue with selection and interviews.

title: Chief Operating Officer - Customer Success - PropTech SaaS Management
description:
Är du en vass projektledare som tidigare haft personalansvar? Är du en IT-generalist med intresse av system och mjukvara? Vill du vara med och leverera den bästa kundupplevelsen i kombination med att leda människor?
 



 Då ska du läsa vidare och se om den här tjänsten kan vara ett spännande nästa steg för dig!
 



  





 I denna annons har kunden valt att vara anonym. Längst ner i annonsen kan du kontakta oss för mer information.
 



  





  





**Om rollen** 




 Vårt Customer Success team består av 20+ medarbetare med ca 4-5 direktrapporterande. Som ansvarig chef och affärsområdesansvarig kommer du att driva och vägleda teamet och ta ansvar för de större kunddialogerna genom upphandlingar och change requests kring vår Saas-lösning.
 



 Vår programvara erbjuder en helhetslösning och riktar sig primärt mot fastighetsförvaltare, hyresförvaltare och arbetsplatsförvaltare. Du kommer ha 4-5 direktrapporterande teamleaders på en nordisk nivå och fokusera på att coacha, stötta och driva på teamet genom att ta fram vision, mål, kpi:er och strategi och ansvara för större anbud och projekt.
 



  





 Koncernen är en etablerad aktör med flera tusen anställda i Norden. Med många år bakom sig har man byggt en stabil grund och en stark kultur i bolaget där man värdesätter en nära och personlig relation med varandra och har en inkluderande arbetsmiljö. Trots storleken på bolaget är man stolta över att behålla en trevlig och personlig atmosfär!
 



  





  





**Din bakgrund och personlighet** 




 För att lyckas i denna roll ser vi att du har erfarenhet från projektledning på en senior nivå och du har inga problem att ta en kunddialog på en högre nivå med t ex change requests. Du är en dynamisk ledare, med tidigare erfarenhet av personalansvar, som älskar att bygga relationer och skapa värde för både kunder och verksamhet.
 



 Du har ett starkt affärssinne och förstår vad som krävs för att generera intäkter.
 



 Ett plus är om du har erfarenhet från facility/energy-managementbranschen och har jobbat nära systemlösningar där du tagit kunddialoger i samband med systemimplementationer och förvaltning av dessa.
 



  





 Du har en bred och generell IT-kompetens, gärna inom system/applikationsförvaltning.
 



  





  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 



* En ledande roll inom ett växande företag
* Möjlighet att forma och utveckla vår Customer Success-funktion
* Konkurrenskraftig lön och förmåner
* Stöd från ett erfaret ledarteam och HR-avdelning
* En inkluderande och familjär arbetsmiljö



  





  





 Kontoret är beläget i centrala Stockholm, och möjlighet finns även att arbeta från Göteborg eller Malmö.
 



  





  





**Ansökan** 




 Intressant? Skicka in din ansökan till oss via jobbsökarlänken eller sök tjänten via vår hemsida: www.houseofskills.se
 



 Vid frågor går det bra att höra av dig till oss som är rekryteringsansvariga:
 



 eller Linda.freij@houseofskills.se eller Linda.Mukka@houseofskills.se
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Lösningsarkitekt IT
description:
Vi söker en lösningsarkitekt IT till myndighet inom det svenska kraftsystemet.
   

  

 Detta är ett konsultuppdrag. Du kommer vara anställd av Centio Consulting Group AB och arbeta som konsult.
   

  

 Tjänsten är på heltid, och säkerhetsprövning krävs.
   

  

 Uppdraget innebär ett nära samarbete med kunden vilket ställer stora krav på flexibilitet och samarbetsförmåga.
   

  

**Uppdraget**
 Myndigheten är den som ansvarar för att elöverföringssystemet är säkert, miljöanpassat och kostnadseffektivt – i dag och i framtiden. Den drivs i form av ett statligt affärsverk. Myndigheten har drygt 1400 medarbetare; de flesta arbetar på huvudkontoret i Sundbyberg.
   

  

 Som lösningsarkitekt-IT kommer konsulten att spela en nyckelroll i att designa, utveckla och implementera driftsäkra system och applikationer. Konsultens fokus kommer att ligga på användarvänlighet, robusthet och säkerhet. Konsultens initiala placering kommer att vara i ett förvaltningsobjekt med system inom elberedskap och säkerhet, systemen som kontinuerligt vidareutvecklas och förvaltas. Det kan även bli aktuellt att arbeta med andra förvaltningsobjekt inom divisionens verksamhetsområden.
   

  

 Myndigheten söker en konsult som har en gedigen bakgrund inom lösningsdesign av IT-system, med djup förståelse och erfarenhet av kritiska IT-system med hög skyddsklass och höga krav på informationssäkerhet.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
* Tekniskt kravarbete, d.v.s. att bidra i kravarbetet med att omvandla verksamhetsbehov, säkerhetskrav etc till mer systemnära krav.
* Analysera behov (funktionella, icke funktionella) ur såväl strategiskt, taktiskt som operativt perspektiv.
* Leda och driva framtagandet av lösning utifrån såväl ett verksamhets- som tekniskt perspektiv.
* Säkerställa att lösningar utformas i enlighet med myndighetens målarkitekturer och standarder samt lagkrav.
* Kommunicera och förankra rekommenderade lösningar och vägval hos relevanta målgrupper, på såväl strategisk nivå som operativ nivå.


**Krav (OBS, obligatoriska)**
 Högskole/universitetsutbildning inom IT-området alternativt minst 10 års arbetslivserfarenhet från IT-området.
   

  

 Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av lösningsdesign av applikationer och IT-system, varav 3 år i rollen som lösningsarkitekt, de senaste 10 åren
   

  

 Minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur
   

  

 Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av lösningsdesign inom säkerhetsskyddad verksamhet och informationssäkerhetsarbete, involverande kritiska IT-system med hög skyddsklass
   

  

 Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet från agila arbetssätt och verktyg såsom Azure Devops, Jira, Confluence etc
   

  

**Meriterande**
 Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete som lösningsarkitekt IT av säkra kommunikationslösningar, exempelvis Rakel, PKI, krypto
   

  

 Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt IT av registerkontrollsystem
   

  

 Minst 1 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom statlig myndighet eller offentlig sektor
   

  

**Om oss**
 Centios övergripande mål är att vara ett konsultbolag som erbjuder smarta och hållbara lösningar som utvecklar samhället på ett positivt sätt.
   

  

 Våra medarbetare erbjuds villkor som är anpassade för individen. Det innebär att arbetstider, arbetsomfattning, arbetsplats och kompetensutveckling så långt som möjligt anpassas utifrån medarbetarens behov.
   

  

 Bland våra medarbetare hittar du engagerad personer som brinner för samhällsutveckling. Vi jobbar i små grupper där du kan bidra med dina erfarenheter samtidigt som du får ta del av andras kunskap och erfarenhet.
   

  

 För oss är det viktigt med välmående och att hitta en sund balans mellan arbete och fritid. Därför har vi en nollvision mot stress och sätter trivsel och hälsa främst.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om oss på centio.se.
   

  

**Vänligen skicka ditt CV på svenska.**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: Principal Engineer
description:
Flexera saves customers billions of dollars in wasted technology spend. A pioneer in Hybrid ITAM and FinOps, Flexera provides award-winning, data-oriented SaaS solutions for technology value optimization (TVO), enabling IT, finance, procurement and cloud teams to gain deep insights into cost optimization, compliance and risks for each business service. Flexera One solutions are built on a set of definitive customer, supplier and industry data, powered by our Technology Intelligence Platform, that enables organizations to visualize their Enterprise Technology Blueprint™ in hybrid environments—from on-premises to SaaS to containers to cloud.
 



  





 We’re transforming the software industry. We’re Flexera. With
 **more than 50,000 customers** 
 across the world, we’re achieving that goal. But we know we can’t do any of that without our team. Ready to help us re-imagine the industry during a time of substantial growth and ambitious plans? Come and see why
 **we’re consistently recognized by Gartner, Forrester and IDC** 
 as a category leader in the marketplace. Learn more at
 **flexera.com** 




  





**Principal Software Engineer** 




  





 As a Principal Software Engineer at Flexera, you will play a crucial role in setting the technical direction and architecture for our cutting-edge SaaS Management product.
 



 Your work will span the entire spectrum of activities required to run a high-performance cloud solution, guiding multiple teams and partner with engineers to develop innovative solutions to complex issues. You will promote best practices across the team and will act as quality expert ensuring our solutions are scalable, secure, and performant. As part of the architecture council, you will help evolve and implement the architectural direction and strategies within Flexera and be a key player that will allow us to deliver on our functional and non-functional requirements for years to come.
 



  





 While much of our work is done remotely, we value the ability to connect face-to-face for high value collaboration activities. As such, our ideal candidate will be based in Stockholm, Sweden.
 



  





**What You'll Do:** 




  




* Actively participate in an agile software development life cycle, including decomposing requirements, documenting and discussing the design, estimation, and implementation.
* Design and implement cloud-based, multi-layered software applications with a strong focus on scalability, performance, and security. Lead the technical roadmap for the SaaS Manager product line.
* Prototype new solutions, contribute to code reviews and analysis of issues, primarily in Go in Kubernetes in Azure.
* Collaborate with Chief Architect, Principal and Lead engineers, and product management to develop technology strategy and architecture for current and future products
* Lead and participate in architecture discussions, generating recommendations that align with the business goals and technology strategy.
* Engage in rapid prototyping and pair programming to validate concepts and refine solutions.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, UX designers and Cloud Operations, to translate requirements into scalable solutions.
* Constantly improve product quality, security, and performance by leveraging the latest deployment and monitoring tools such as ArgoCD, SumoLogic, SonarQube, PagerDuty
* Provide mentorship and technical leadership to the engineering team, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation.
* Collaborate with teams to create and review architecture and design proposals including functional and non-functional requirements.



  





**You'll Be Expected to Have:** 




  




* Extensive experience in developing complex, cloud-based applications, and can show us your personal/work projects. - Extensive experience with a functional or object-oriented language (Go, C#, Java)
